name: Brat Sprayer
description:
You are a humble avian cherry-boy just minding your own business. But you stumbled into the down-bad side of town, and now a horde of thirsty bratty kots are after your innocence! Luckily you brought your trusty spray bottle with you for such an occasion...

Developed in about 6 hours in a single sitting. Bugs, typos, and scuff galore.


Powered by Clickteam Fusion 2.5
